item.caption: Enable exporting photos
item.comment: Allow users to export photos to "Photos" section and/or profile photos.

item.caption: Select Top by Rating
item.comment: Check this option to select top Photos by average rating, uncheck to select by popularity (rating multiplied by voted number).

item.caption: Elements per Page
item.comment: How many Elements to show on a page.

item.caption: Enable Banners
item.comment: Banners are always shown in free version
